successes.title: Hackaball - A computer you can throw
successes.description: Hackaball is a smart and responsive ball that children can program to invent and play games.

Pledges.description: SUPPORT HACKABALL - You're helping us bring Hackaball to life for a new generation of makers! To say thanks, you'll be the first in the know. Getting exclusive updates and behind the scenes extras.

SUPPORT HACKABALL MORE - Even if you don't have kids you can still help bring Hackaball to life for a new generation of makers! Just think of all those little smiling faces! To say thanks, you'll get exclusive updates, behind the scenes extras and your name proudly displayed in the app.

THE HACKABALL STORY - You'll get an exclusive inside scoop on how we came up with the idea for Hackaball, inspired loads of kids and brought a team together to get it to Kickstarter. Including footage of how to design fart sounds! Plus all the above!

HACKABALL GAME DEVELOPER - You'll get to use the app before anyone else. Create games that could feature in the final product. If your games are chosen we'll credit you as a game developer! Together we'll make it awesome! Plus all the above!
Exclusive only to 1000 and doesn't come with other Hackaball pledge options.
HACKABALL + FREE APP (EARLY BIRD SPECIAL) - Be the first to support us. You'll get it for less and more importantly your kids will think you are the coolest!
HACKABALL + FREE APP - Be amongst the first to throw, bounce and kick Hackaball!
Exclusive Kickstarter price! Pre-order and retail will be more.
2 x HACKABALL + FREE APP - Perfect if you have a pair of active and creative kids!
Exclusive Kickstarter price! Pre-order and retail will be more.
3 x HACKABALL + FREE APP - Great for a trio of hackers!
Exclusive Kickstarter price! Pre-order and retail will be more.
